block.p: BASEBALL American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Signed RHP Ken Hill to a minor league contract. National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Activated OF Roger Cedeno from the 15-day disabled list. Waived OF Matt Mieske. Northern League SIOUX FALLS CANARIES--Sold the contract of INF Enohel Polanco to the Cleveland Indians.

BASEBALL American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Signed RHP Ken Hill to a minor league contract. National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Activated OF Roger Cedeno from the 15-day disabled list. Waived OF Matt Mieske. Northern League SIOUX FALLS CANARIES--Sold the contract of INF Enohel Polanco to the Cleveland Indians.
BASKETBALL National Basketball Association CHARLOTTE HORNETS--Agreed to terms with F Lee Nailon.

FOOTBALL National Football League CINCINNATI BENGALS--Waived S Greg Myers. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Placed WR Anthony Lucas on the physically-unable-to-perform list and RB Rondell Mealey on injured reserve. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Placed S Carnell Lake and OL Joey Chustz on injured reserve.
Xtreme Football League CHICAGO--Named John Lanctot director of public relations.

HOCKEY National Hockey League DETROIT RED WINGS--Agreed to terms with G Jason Elliott and F B.J. Young on two-year contracts and F Toivo Suursoo on a one-year contract. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Signed C Toby Petersen. East Coast Hockey League JOHNSTOWN CHIEFS--Agreed to terms with D Brent Bilodeau and G Karol Kirzan. United States Hockey League SIOUX FALLS STAMPEDE--Announced F Rick Gorman has signed a contract with Syracuse of the AHL.

COLLEGE ALMA--Named Nathan Kronewetter men's assistant soccer coach. ARMSTRONG STATE--Named Flori Willie women's assistant basketball coach and Andrea Bloodworth women's graduate assistant basketball coach. DAYTON--Named Bill Comar men's assistant basketball coach and Josh Postorino coordinator of basketball operations. ELON--Named Patti Raduenz softball coach. MINNESOTA--Named Melissa Young-Kruse women's assistant basketball coach. OHIO NORTHERN--Named Eric Westerfield assistant football coach and women's golf coach and Tim Hibbs assistant football coach. OHIO WESLEYAN--Named Marge Redmond field hockey coach. PACE--Named Tanya Yavarow women's assistant soccer coach. UTAH--Named Beth Jerome women's assistant swimming coach. UTICA--Named Tim Myslinski defensive coordinator, Frank Palmisano tight ends coach, Carvon Brazier running backs coach, Vin Sorce defensive assistant and William Berry defensive line coach. VERMONT--Named Rick Gouse women's volleyball coach. WENTWORTH--Named Tom Randolph baseball coach.
